QuestData.Title: The Chieftain's Beads
QuestData.Description: The ceremonial beads, decorated with shells and feathers, are worn by the clan's chieftain.$B$BPerhaps Elder Sookh would be interested in seeing these.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Sookh at Smolderhide Thicket.
QuestData.RewardText: Graw was the first to succumb to the madness, and the rest of the clan followed.$B$BWith these, I will take the reins as our clan's new chieftain.$B$BThank you, traveler. I will do my best to rebuild my clan.
